rule:
The tags must be used to emphasize multiple key words or phrases within each

tag.
input: Science unravels mysteries. Discoveries enlighten minds. Understanding evolves over time.
output:
Science unravels mysteries. Discoveries enlighten minds. Understanding evolves over time.

Science unravels mysteries. Discoveries enlighten minds. Understanding evolves over time.
evaluation:
ERR The output only contains two

tags, but the description requires at least three

tags.
